trans-unit.source: Please choose the language to use during the installation of Siwapp
trans-unit.target: Va rugam sa alegeti limba pentru procesul de instalare Siwapp

trans-unit.source: If any of these items are highlighted in red then please take actions to correct them
trans-unit.target: Daca oricare dintre randuri sunt marcate cu rosu va rugam sa luati masurile necesare pentru corectare

trans-unit.source: Failure to do so could lead to your Siwapp installation not functioning correctly
trans-unit.target: In cazul in care nu corectati greselile, aplicatia Swiapp nu va functiona corect

trans-unit.source: These settings are recommended for PHP in order to ensure full compatibility with Siwapp
trans-unit.target: Aceste setari PHP sunt recomandate pentru a asigura o compatibilitate completa cu Swiapp

trans-unit.source: However, Siwapp will still operate if your settings do not quite match the recommended
trans-unit.target: Swiapp va continua sa functioneze chiar daca setarile nu coincid cu cele recomandate

trans-unit.source: Enter your database connection details below.
trans-unit.target: Introduceti datele pentru baza de date mai jos.

trans-unit.source: If you're not sure about these, contact your host.
trans-unit.target: Daca nu sunteti sigur va rugam sa va contactati provider-ul.

trans-unit.source: php.ini has zend.ze1_compatibility_mode set to off
Set zend.ze1_compatibility_mode to off in php.ini ([1])
trans-unit.target: Seteaza zend.ze1_compatibility_mode in off in php.ini ([1])

trans-unit.source: Install PDO (mandatory for Propel and Doctrine)
trans-unit.target: Instaleaza PDO (obligatoriu pentru Propel si Doctrine)

trans-unit.source: Install PDO drivers (mandatory for Propel and Doctrine)
trans-unit.target: Instaleaza drivere-le PDO (oblogatoriu pentru Propel si Doctrine)

trans-unit.source: Install the PHP-XML module (required by Propel)
Install the XSL module (recommended for Propel)
Install a PHP accelerator like APC (highly recommended)
trans-unit.target: Instaleaza un accelerator PHP (APC, xCache etc.) (foarte recomandat)

trans-unit.source: php.ini has safe_mode set to off
php.ini has short_open_tag set to off
php.ini has magic_quotes_gpc set to off
php.ini has register_globals set to off
php.ini has session.auto_start set to off
Set safe_mode to off in php.ini
Set short_open_tag to off in php.ini
Set magic_quotes_gpc to off in php.ini
Set register_globals to off in php.ini
Set session.auto_start to off in php.ini
is Free Software released under the MIT license
trans-unit.target: este Software Gratuit distribuit sub licenta MIT

trans-unit.source: Can't connect to the database. Please review the data.
trans-unit.target: Conecatare la baza de date esuata.Va rugam verificati datele.

trans-unit.source: Enter the following information for the super administrator user:
trans-unit.target: Introduceti urmatoarele informatii pentru utilizatorul super administrator:

trans-unit.source: If you want to preload the database with sample data, check the following checkbox.
trans-unit.target: Daca doriti sa incarcati baza de date cu date demo va rugam bifati urmatoarea casuta.

trans-unit.source: Click the "Finish" button to start the Siwapp application.
trans-unit.target: Apasa "Finalizare" pentru a porni aplicatia Siwapp.

trans-unit.source: Please review the following error messages carefully and try to correct them before you continue.
trans-unit.target: Va rugam sa cititi cu atentie erorile urmatoare si corectati-le inainte de a continua.

trans-unit.source: Siwapp needs to have write permissions over certain files and directories
trans-unit.target: Siwapp necesite drepturi de scriere pentru anumite fisiere si foldere

trans-unit.source: Once you've checked out the instructions above, click the "Finish" button to finish the installation process.
trans-unit.target: Dupa ce ati verificati instructiunile de mai sus, apasati "Finalizare" pentru a incheia procesul de instalare.
Va rugam sa cititi instructiunile cu atentie:

trans-unit.source: We couldn't write to %1% file. Please download it %2%here%3% and replace it at %4% by yourself
trans-unit.target: Nu s-a putut scrie in fisierul %1%. Descarcati-l %2%here%3% si inlocuiti %4%

trans-unit.source: PLEASE TAKE THE FOLLOWING SECURITY MEASURES:
trans-unit.target: VA RUGAM SA LUATI URMATOARELE MASURI DE SECURITATE:

trans-unit.source: Remove the write permissions of the %1% file
trans-unit.target: Scoateti drepturile de scriere pentru fisierul %1%

trans-unit.source: There were some sql errors creating the database.
trans-unit.target: Am intampinat erori sql la crearea bazei de date.

trans-unit.source: The %1% directory exists and is writable
trans-unit.target: Directorul %1% exista si poate fi scris

trans-unit.source: Make sure the %1% directory is writable (%2%)
trans-unit.target: Asigurati-va ca directorul %1% are drepturi de scriere (%2%)

trans-unit.source: There are some tables at your database that will be overwritten by the Siwapp installation process
trans-unit.target: Exista tabele in baza de date care vor fi rescrise de procesul de instalare

trans-unit.source: You need to click the checkbox to allow the tables to be overwritten
trans-unit.target: Trebuie sa bifati casuta pentru a permite rescrierea tabelelor

trans-unit.source: The mod_rewrite apache module is available
